articles.content: Former Manchester City and Manchester United striker Carlos Tevez has confirmed his retirement after the Argentinian said he could no longer continue playing following the death of his father last ye… [+4601 chars]

articles.title: Cameron Smith takes 36-hole solo lead | Round 2 | the Memorial | 2022 - PGA TOUR
articles.description: In the second round of the Memorial Tournament presented by Workday 2022, Cameron Smith shot a 3-under 69, taking the solo one-shot lead after 36 holes.SUBSC...

articles.author: Ben Willcocks
articles.title: Casper Ruud semi-final win over Marin Cilic stopped for 10 minutes as protestor ties herself to net - Daily Mail
articles.description: Casper Ruud and Marin Cilic were held up by a protestor in the third set of their second semi-final at Roland Garros. The players were forced to depart for approximately 10 minutes.
articles.content:
Casper Ruud and Marin Cilic's French Open semi-final was held up by a protestor who tied herself to the net during the third set of their clash at Roland Garros on Friday night. 
The players were fo… [+2491 chars]
